name: spher-governor-vscode
description: VS Code extension to govern AI actions through local SPHER/CFS pipeline.

spher.baseUrl.description: Base URL for local AM orchestrator service

spher.computeUiUrl.description: Dedicated compute UI URL for extension-side opening (separate port recommended)

spher.autoAwake.description: Automatically send SPHER::AWAKE via am-agent when spher_mode is false

spher.strictMode.description: Fail closed for uncertain or mutating actions

spher.httpReadOnly.description: Block mutating intents over extension HTTP path

spher.apiUser.description: x-api-user header sent to AM orchestrator

spher.amAgentPath.description: Executable path for local am-agent CLI

spher.amAgentCwd.description: Working directory used when launching am-agent (empty = current workspace if available)

spher.allowCargoFallback.description: Fallback to cargo run when am-agent binary is not in PATH

spher.orchestratorManifestPath.description: Manifest path used for cargo fallback execution (empty = auto-detect in workspace)

spher.pollMs.description: Polling interval in milliseconds for compute updates

spher.useStream.description: Use SSE stream (/api/v1/compute/stream) for near real-time compute events

spher.dataphyEnabled.description: Compute DATAPHY envelope for each governed action.

spher.dataphyTimeoutMs.description: Timeout in milliseconds for DATAPHY CLI execution.

spher.dataphyUseCargoFallback.description: Run `cargo run --bin dataphy_cli` when DATAPHY CLI is not found.

spher.dataphyManifestPath.description: Cargo manifest path used by DATAPHY fallback execution (empty = auto-detect in workspace).

spher.dataphyCwd.description: Working directory for DATAPHY CLI/fallback execution (empty = current workspace if available).
